statements: SELECT * FROM employee_survey_responses
SELECT employee_id, response_text FROM employee_survey_responses WHERE response_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM employee_survey_responses WHERE survey_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT response_id, response_date FROM employee_survey_responses ORDER BY response_date DESC
SELECT DISTINCT survey_id FROM employee_survey_responses
SELECT * FROM employee_survey_responses WHERE employee_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT response_id, employee_id, survey_id FROM employee_survey_responses WHERE survey_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440001' ORDER BY response_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(response_id) AS total_responses FROM employee_survey_responses GROUP BY employee_id HAVING COUNT(response_id) > 1;
SELECT response_id, response_text FROM employee_survey_responses WHERE response_text LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY response_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT survey_id FROM employee_survey_responses ORDER BY survey_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM employee_engagement_responses;
SELECT employee_id, satisfaction_rating FROM employee_engagement_responses WHERE satisfaction_rating > 3;
SELECT survey_question, satisfaction_rating FROM employee_engagement_responses WHERE survey_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM inclusion_disparities ORDER BY disparity_date DESC;
SELECT disparity_type, notes FROM inclusion_disparities WHERE employee_id = 'abc123';
SELECT * FROM employee_engagement_responses WHERE satisfaction_rating > 4 ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, survey_date, survey_question FROM employee_engagement_responses WHERE employee_id = 'fd0b3b13-18b6-4f8b-98a7-895a72c1c78a' AND survey_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT survey_question, satisfaction_rating FROM employee_engagement_responses WHERE survey_question LIKE '%diversity%' AND satisfaction_rating < 3 ORDER BY survey_date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_responses FROM employee_engagement_responses WHERE survey_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT SUM(satisfaction_rating) AS total_rating FROM employee_engagement_responses WHERE survey_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM employee_survey_responses;
SELECT employee_id, survey_date FROM employee_survey_responses WHERE inclusion_score > 80;
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM employee_details ORDER BY department ASC;
SELECT * FROM survey_questions WHERE question_type = 'multiple_choice';
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(*) AS response_count FROM employee_survey_responses GROUP BY employee_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT * FROM employee_survey_responses WHERE inclusion_score > 80
SELECT survey_date, inclusion_score FROM employee_survey_responses ORDER BY survey_date DESC, inclusion_score ASC
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, department, position FROM employee_details WHERE department = 'Engineering'
SELECT response_id, survey_date, inclusion_score FROM employee_survey_responses WHERE survey_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'

SELECT e.employee_id, e.first_name, e.last_name, s.question_text FROM employee_details e JOIN employee_survey_responses r ON e.employee_id = r.employee_id JOIN survey_questions s ON r.response_id = s.question_id ORDER BY e.employee_id ASC
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_id, department, position FROM employees WHERE age > 30;
SELECT survey_id, question1, question2 FROM surveys ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, department, gender FROM employees WHERE ethnicity = 'Asian';
SELECT employee_id, position, age, gender FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY gender DESC, department ASC
SELECT department, position, age FROM employees WHERE gender = 'Female' AND position = 'Manager'
SELECT DISTINCT ethnicity FROM employees
SELECT e.employee_id, s.survey_date, r.question1_response FROM employees e JOIN responses r ON e.employee_id = r.employee_id JOIN surveys s ON r.survey_id = s.survey_id

SELECT d.disparity_id, e.employee_id, s.survey_id, d.inclusion_score FROM employees e JOIN disparities d ON e.employee_id = d.employee_id JOIN surveys s ON d.survey_id = s.survey_id ORDER BY d.inclusion_score DESC
SELECT * FROM employee_details;
SELECT employee_name, position FROM employee_details WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT response, response_date FROM survey_responses ORDER BY response_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, inclusion_rating FROM inclusion_score WHERE inclusion_rating > 3;
SELECT disparity_type, impact_score FROM inclusion_disparities WHERE impact_score < 5;
SELECT * FROM employee_details WHERE department = 'Sales';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employee_details ORDER BY department ASC, employee_name DESC;
SELECT survey_question, response FROM survey_responses WHERE response_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT employee_id FROM inclusion_score WHERE inclusion_rating > 4;
SELECT survey_question, response, survey_date FROM survey_responses JOIN survey_results ON survey_responses.response_id = survey_results.result_id;
